name: Unlimited Armament Works
author: Eschatologue
description:
UAW is a port and sequel to Heavy Armaments Industries, implementing new unique content to vanilla Mindustry, from more turrets, units, and crafters/factories.

A lot of work and improvements goes into UAW, if you want to show some support or like the content, please give the mod a star on GitHub, Thank you!

description: The mod displays more information in-game, such as unit/building, wave, core, tile, item/unit total info etc

name: UI Lib

description: Library for other mods that unifies and simplifies UI creation.

name: RTFM
author: deltanedas
description:
Mod that adds a manual page library. RTFM in the About menu.
Comes with documentation of vanilla'a Logic system.
Optionally requires deltanedas/ui-lib for extra buttons.
pt_BR translations by King-BR

name: Scheme Size
author: xzxADIxzx
description:
A mod that increases the schematic size limit to 512 blocks! Adds admins, renderer and building tools. Has an updater, keybinds and AI support.
Vanilla Only!

   - Release!
   - Settings
   - Java 8
   - Controls
   - Updater
   - Mobile Support
   - Admins Tools

   - Building Tools
   - AI Power
   - Renderer Tools
   - Deep Cleaning
   - Schematic Shortcuts
   - Cursed Schematics
   - Advanced Dev Console
   - Copy Link and Join

my first Java Mod. multi craft-generator, multi turret, multi drill and few thing more! 
not completely finished/released yet. but i'm sure it's still enough for you to be interested in this mod, this contents, this ideas!

name: Developer Mode

description:
Lets you type into the console.
Press F8 to open.

name: Schematics Pack
author: pixecoz
description:
ENG:
⚠WARN: WHEN YOU INSTALL THIS MOD, ALL MOD SCHEMATICS WILL BE LOADED TO YOUR GAME SAVE. This means that even after removing the mod, the schemes will not be deleted. You have been warned. Aslo you can download normal pack as before on GitHub releases.

Mod adds schematics and map for schematics. Contains schematics for many resources, energy, units, and more.

With this pack you can learn different tricks in the schemes, and improve your skill in schemes.

Thanks to all those who make the schemes, because without you the mod would not exist!



RUS:
⚠ВНИМАНИЕ: КОГДА ТЫ УСТАНОВИШЬ ЭТОТ МОД, ВСЕ СХЕМЫ ИЗ МОДА ЗАГРУЗЯТСЯ В ТВОЁ ИГРОВОЕ СОХРАНЕНИЕ. Это значит, что даже после удаления мода, схемы не удалятся. Вы были предупреждены. Также вы можете скачать обычный пакет, как и раньше, на GitHub релизах.

Мод добавляет схемы и карту для схем. Содержит схемы для многих ресурсов, энергии, юнитов и многого другого.

С помощью этого пака вы сможете изучить разные фишки в схемах и улучшить свое мастерство в схемах.

Спасибо всем, кто делает схемы, ведь без вас мода бы не было!


Special thanks to: Qwaka.

name: Auto Research
author: Flin
description:
A simple mod that researches content automatically.

Algorithm description:
Looks up for avaliable tech nodes with all the objectives completed, then sorts them by real cost.

First of all it unlocks content like maps and items (with no costs), then it researches the cheapest node with the avaliable items in the planet.

You can disable the auto-research in Settings/Game/Auto Research

This mod is multiplayer-compatible!

So, basically... This mod adds new ways of controlling your unit (mostly for mobile): fully manual and fully ai.

Ai mode includes three actions (attack, mine, patrol) + auto action selection.

Check readme.md for detailed info.

name: More conveyors, conduits, batteries, storage and unload...
author: Pseudo Coffee
description:
New armored variants of vanilla distribution blocks.

New armored variants of vanilla liquid distribution blocks.

5 new faster conveyor types.

2 new conduits.

3 new faster unloaders.

1 new larger storage vault.
1 new larger storage container

1 new larger liquid tank.

2 new batteries.

1 new wall that combines the abilities of the Surge Wall, Plastanium Wall and Phase Wall.

Adds new ways to destroy nature, mostly factories.

The sprites and code are subject to change.

Will be mostly rewritten once i figure out how mindustry java works.

name: Amy's Little Mod
author: Amy
description:
A little mod with a few minor additions.

I made this mod because I missed the Serpulo-style bridges on Erekir, and my wife missed the item junctions.  It also includes an alternate incinerator that is more expensive to make but free to use, as we both would have preferred the incinerator have no upkeep cost once you build it.

The intention is that nothing should be game-breaking, but just be minor little quality-of-life additions.
